record.title: TRIBUTES TO SENATOR JESSE HELMS
record.narrative:
TRIBUTES TO SENATOR JESSE HELMS -- (Senate - July 08, 2008)

[Page: S6448]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the tributes to Senator Helms in the Congressional Record be printed as a Senate document and that Senators be permitted to submit statements for inclusion until August 1.
